page.title: 15A Day in the life of my Dad
page.content: My dad got up at 6.00am. He had a wash and had breakfast. Before he went to work,he fed the cat,took the dogs for a walk and checked the greenhouse. He left at 7.15am for work Ranx Xerox, Mitcheldean which is 13 miles from home. He began work at 8.00am. At work he checked and repaired copying machines. He worked until 4.45pm having a lunchbreak of 40 minutes,to eat his sandwiches. He arrived home at 5.10pm. He fed the cat and ferrets, walked and fed the dogs,before he had his evening meal at about 6.00pm. He helped wash up and then he worked in the garden until about 9.00pm. He then shaved and had a shower. Afterwards he read the newspaper and watched T.V., had his supper and then went to bed at about 11.00pm.
